message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $180. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget, but the product is worth more to me. How about we meet in the middle at $160?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to pay $145 for it.
